steps.title: Contact Us
steps.description: Send a message here, on Facebook, or give us a call — whatever suits you best. Describe your idea! Together we’ll consider the best solutions tailored to you. At this stage, you’ll also receive a preliminary estimate and timeline.

steps.title: Design
steps.description: Our graphic designer will shine at this stage, preparing concepts and visualizations that reflect your company’s character and your target audience’s preferences.

steps.title: Coding
steps.description: Time to bring your idea into the digital space. Our code masters will ensure your product is as functional and responsive as possible.

steps.title: Finished Product
steps.description: Now you can enjoy your completed product and count on our ongoing support.

faq.question: How much does it cost to build a website or app?
faq.answer: The cost depends on the project scope — its features, complexity, and graphic needs. After a brief conversation, we’ll prepare a free, tailored quote.

faq.question: How long does it take to complete a project?
faq.answer: A simple project takes about 2–3 weeks; more complex implementations start from 4 weeks. The exact timeline is agreed individually.

faq.question: Can I edit the content on the site myself after it's done?
faq.answer: Yes! We build sites on systems that allow easy content editing without coding knowledge. We also provide short training or instructions.

faq.question: Do you help with domain and hosting setup?
faq.answer: Yes — we can assist at every stage, including selecting and configuring a domain, hosting, and company email.

faq.question: Do you offer support after project completion?
faq.answer: Yes. After deployment, we’re available for updates, fixes, or further development — you can always count on us.

faq.question: Can I commission only the design without coding?
faq.answer: Yes, we also offer standalone graphic designs — for example, to pass on to your own development team.

faq.question: Do you also build online stores and mobile apps?
faq.answer: Yes. We create online stores, web apps, and mobile apps — tailored to your industry and customers.

faq.question: Can you help with SEO and marketing?
faq.answer: Yes. We provide support in SEO optimization and basic SEM activities as well as visual identity.

steps.title: Contact
steps.description: Write to us, tell us about your idea and needs.

steps.title: Brief
steps.description: Together we gather all the information needed for the project.

steps.description: We research the market, your industry, and your target audience.

steps.title: Concept

steps.title: Graphic Design
steps.description: We develop a thoughtful and aesthetically pleasing design.

steps.title: Prototype

steps.title: Coding
steps.description: We develop the website or app according to the design.

steps.title: Testing and Revisions
steps.description: We check the functionality and make any necessary changes.

steps.title: Launch
steps.description: We publish the finished product and support you after launch.
